Key Match Events: Anastasios Bakasetas scored the first goal for Greece three minutes after the interval.
Petros Mantalos scored the second goal for Greece in added time after a mistake by Ireland's goalkeeper Caoimhin Kelleher.
Post-Match Reflections: Greece extended their perfect Nations League campaign with a 2-0 home win over Republic of Ireland.
The match was emotionally charged following the death of former Greek teammate George Baldock.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ireland's goalkeeper Caoimhin Kelleher made four important saves in the first half.
The match was held at Georgios Karaiskakis Stadium with an attendance of 30,253.
A minute's silence was observed before kick-off in memory of George Baldock.
